author: ghost
body:
It would be very nice to have the equivalent of the unix syntax for this; something like:

```
with-env app_master='http://host.example.com' mycmd
```

comments.author: lzybkr
comments.body: Agreed, this would be nice. It's a duplicate though, see https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/issues/3316

title: Feature request: setting environment variables for single commands
